wordGroup: linguistic context 语言语境；语言的前后关系
linguistic meaning 言内意义；语学意义；语言学意义

sentences.en: His linguistic ability served him well in his chosen profession.
sentences.cn: 他的语言能力对他所选择的职业大有帮助。

sentences.en: The ability to write is a supreme test of linguistic competence.
sentences.cn: 写作能力是对语言能力的最高形式的测试。

sentences.en: Popular linguistic debate regularly deteriorates into invective and polemic.
sentences.cn: 流行的语言辩论经常沦为谩骂和论战。
